rules_text:
Whenever a nontoken creature you control enters, choose one –
• Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
• Create an Estus token. [i](It's an artifact with “{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.”)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Many are called. Not all are Chosen.[/i]
